per_frame_1=wave_x = wave_x + 0.1*sin(5*bass);
per_frame_2=wave_y = wave_y + 0.1*sin(5*bass);
per_frame_3=wave_r = wave_r + 1;
per_frame_4=wave_g =wave_g + rand(2);
per_frame_5=wave_b = 0;
per_frame_6=//rot = rot + if (above(bass,0), +0.02*sin(6*bass) - 0.025*cos(4.75*bass), 0);
per_pixel_1=//zoom = zoom + 0.05*rad;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // PAINTERLY EFFECT:
warp_4=`    float t = 0.005 + 0.025*saturate(treb-1);
warp_5=`    float2 uv2 = uv;
warp_6=`    float2 delta2 = texsize.zw*float2(1,1);
warp_7=`    float3 blurry_color = tex2D( sampler_main, 
warp_8=`        lerp(uv,uv_orig,-1) + delta2 ).xyz;
warp_9=`    uv2.xy += (blurry_color.xy-0.37) * t;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`    // sample previous frame
warp_12=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv2 ).xyz;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    // darken over time
warp_15=`    ret -= 0.004;    
warp_16=`}
